titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Breast Cancer Care Spell - Description

body.p: A Breast Cancer Care Spell is a Cancer Care Spell , which is an ACTIVITY GROUP .
A Breast Cancer Care Spell Â is a continuous period of care, including assessment for care, for a PATIENT who has been diagnosed as suffering from breast cancer.
A Breast Cancer Care Spell may be the result of a specific referral for breast assessment.
